products.name: HEROES JOURNEY BEGINNER DECK
products.tagline: The *Dwarzian Distortion* Booster Box is the perfect entry point for new players looking to dive into the world of strategic card battles. Each pack includes balanced cards and easy-to-learn mechanics designed to help beginners build competitive decks right from the start.
products.description: Includes starter deck, rulebook, and quick-start guide.

products.name: DISTORTED OBLIVION BOOSTER DECK
products.tagline: Kickstart your journey into *Dwarzian Distortion* with a single Booster Pack featuring a curated mix of beginner-friendly cards. Each pack offers new heroes, spells, and strategies to help you strengthen your deck and master the art of distortion one battle at a time.
products.description: Includes 10 trading cards and 5 Distortion Crystal Shard trading cards.

products.name: DISTORTION BATTLE BOX SET
products.tagline: Welcome to the official universe of Dwarzian Distortion.
products.description: Includes starter deck, rulebook, and quick-start guide.
